metadata.name: Starterr
metadata.description:
Only for AB+.
UPDATE - Now working with GREED Mode
A mod to The Binding of Isaac, making that first Treasure Room contains an item of at least 3 Quality.
There are mods like that, but they do not work with AB+. That's because Quality attribute was added in Repentance and (I think) all of these mods use them. This one works tho.
Have an improvement? https://github.com/D00NIK/Starterr
